title: Drug Education to Turn the Tide on UK Drug Epidemic (Church of Scientology International)
text: ( Source : Church of Scientology International ) Church of Scientology London takes on the UK drug crisis. An article published by the Church of Scientology London looks into the UK drug crisis, citing the 2014 UK Drug Survey that found more
